DataElement.preferredName: Deep Vein Thrombosis Catheter Device Component Relationship Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not deep vein thrombosis was catheter related.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Deep Vein Thrombosis Catheter Device Component Relationship Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A blood clot in a deep vein, predominantly in the lower extremity, but may include the pelvis or upper extremity._A flexible tube designed to transfer fluids into or out of the body._A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Deep Vein Thrombosis Catheter Device Component Relationship
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A blood clot in a deep vein, predominantly in the lower extremity, but may include the pelvis or upper extremity.:A flexible tube designed to transfer fluids into or out of the body.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Concepts.definition: A blood clot in a deep vein, predominantly in the lower extremity, but may include the pelvis or upper extremity.
A flexible tube designed to transfer fluids into or out of the body.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
